Changelog
=========

0.5.0 - (2019-03-20)
--------------------
* Plone 5.2 compatibility, Python 3 compatibility

0.4.0 - (2015-11-23)
--------------------
* Plone 5 compatibility added

0.3.0 - (12.04.2012)
--------------------

* Plone 4(-only) compatibility

0.2.0 - (30.11.2008)
--------------------

* using @@cassandra now requires manager privileges
* fixed issues with the extension profile 


0.1.0 - (29.11.2008)
--------------------

* Initial release
